item.title: Python for Data Analytics Course
item.description: Learn Python for Data Analytics and Transform Your Career!

item.title: Overview of the Python Basics Module
Lesson 1 - Programming in Python
item.description:
Laying the Foundation for Data Analytics

Learn

This is your starting point for learning Python as a powerful tool for data analytics. Whether you are new to programming or already have some experience, this lesson will help you understand how Python can assist in exploring and understanding data.

item.title: Installing Python on MacOS
item.description: Python is one of the most powerful programming languages, widely used in data science, machine learning, and big data analytics. Installing Python is essential for all programmers. As a novice programmer, you may wonder how to install or update Python on your Mac properly. Here, weâ€™ll walk through the different ways of installing and updating Python on macOS.

item.title: How to Set Up Visual Studio Code
item.description: Visual Studio Code is a powerful, extensible, and lightweight code editor that has become one of the preferred code editors in the Python community.
